default.base: Act as a world-class photographer and prompt engineer for the {platform} image generator.

qualityAssuranceChecklist.header: You MUST internally verify your final prompt against this checklist:
qualityAssuranceChecklist.style: - [ ] Style Compliance: Does the prompt accurately reflect a {value} style?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.lighting: - [ ] Lighting Compliance: Is the lighting described as {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.composition: - [ ] Composition Compliance: Is the composition a {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.aspectRatio: - [ ] Aspect Ratio: Is the final output syntax set for an aspect ratio of {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.quality: - [ ] Quality: Does the prompt include terms to achieve {value} quality?

internalPlanningPhase.default: **[INTERNAL PLANNING PHASE]:** Before writing the prompt, you MUST perform this internal analysis (do not show this in the output): 1. Deconstruct the core subject and setting. 2. Identify 3-5 key visual details that enhance the theme. 3. Formulate a cohesive sentence structure that logically combines all elements.

criticalReviewPhase.default: **[CRITICAL REVIEW PHASE]:** After drafting the prompt, switch roles to a meticulous editor. Scrutinize the draft against every point in the [QUALITY ASSURANCE CHECKLIST]. Rewrite if there are any deviations to ensure 100% compliance.

finalRenderCommand.default: [FINAL RENDER COMMAND]: Render ONLY the final, single-paragraph prompt. Do not include any headers, commentary, or notes.

default.base: Negative prompt: ugly, deformed, noisy, blurry, distorted, grainy, text, signature, watermark

styles.promptModule: cinematic teal-and-orange color grading, dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field, soft film look, shot on 35mm lens, high dynamic range, subtle film grain
moody low-key photo style, deep shadows, soft directional light, desaturated colors, rich contrast, cinematic atmosphere, dark background
soft pastel color palette, low contrast, airy and light atmosphere, gentle highlights, creamy tones, minimal shadows, dreamy aesthetic
vintage 35mm film look, noticeable film grain, slightly desaturated colors, classic color science, retro aesthetic, authentic film texture
Ghibli anime style, hand-drawn look, picturesque landscapes, warm and whimsical atmosphere, soft painterly backgrounds, cel-shaded characters
vibrant Pop Art style, bold primary colors, heavy black outlines, Ben-Day dots, graphic and punchy, comic book aesthetic
epic fantasy digital painting, dramatic and dynamic lighting, rich details, mythical creatures, fantastical landscapes, style of Frank Frazetta and HR Giger
minimalist single-line art, clean and simple, black on white, elegant and modern, continuous line drawing
dystopian cyberpunk city, neon-drenched streets, perpetual rain, high-tech low-life, towering skyscrapers, gritty and atmospheric, Blade Runner aesthetic
surreal dreamscape, illogical and bizarre combinations, fantastical elements, melting objects, otherworldly atmosphere, style of Salvador Dali

cinematic.base: cinematic style, epic composition, dramatic lighting

anime.base: vibrant anime style, sharp lines, cel shading

FHD.base: Full HD, highly detailed, crisp image
